::Punch/Scattershot/The Oblitercons::

Punch frowns at the device Tigerhawk takes out. His gun arm trembles 
slightly, but keeps steady. He looks over at Dark One in surprise as the 
leader of the Oblitercons laughs.

"All blast doors, close."

A grinding sound fills the area after that command from Dark One. The light 
coming in from the hole darkens, leaving the room slightly darker. After 
several seconds, all goes silent.

"Now, Tigerhawk," Dark One says smoothly, "With the blast doors closed, your 
explosion would do little more than kill us all in here."

He looks over at Tigerhawk, his eyes narrowing. "You would kill these two 
females along with yourself. Our deaths, however, will go unnoticed. Zardus 
would just find more troops to replace us, or use our spare parts, and yours, 
to make more soldiers. I suggest you take your hand off that button, and toss 
it to Scatter-I mean Punch over there."

Scattershot jumps up and down, DeathStorm's head nearly falling off. "Boom! 
Detonate it, detonate it!"

Punch growls, waiting for Tigerhawk to either push the button or toss him the 
device.
